channel.title: Royalty Free Music | New Music Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Beatsuite.com Music Library
channel.description: Beatsuite.com is a Royalty Free Music Library offering instant Preview, Purchase and Download of high quality production music tracks. License music tracks and audio for any project ranging from podcasts, video production, multimedia, music-on-hold, broadcast, advertising, computer games, music-in-store and much, much more. Music styles ranges from Classical Music, Rock, Hip-Hop, Dance, Techno, Ambient, Jazz, Orchestral, Soundtrack to Chill Out. Whatever you need music for, we have the answer. Visit Beatsuite.com now and make your projects sound fantastic
